ä¸ç”±å¾— (bÃ¹ yÃ³u dÃ©)

This phrase is used to express that something is beyond one's control or involuntarily. It indicates that the action or feeling is not a result of one's own will.



ä¸ç¦ (bÃ¹ jÄ«n)

This phrase is used to indicate that one can't help but do something or feel a certain way. It conveys the sense of being unable to refrain from a particular action or feeling.



For example, if a beautiful scenery makes you involuntarily sigh, you can use ä¸ç”±å¾— (bÃ¹ yÃ³u dÃ©) to express that it's beyond your control. On the other hand, if a touching story makes you unable to hold back tears, you can use ä¸ç¦ (bÃ¹ jÄ«n) to convey that you can't help but cry.
